entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
